feed.title: Nautical Backup Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Thank you to @mrjk for finding the bug, and submitting a PR (https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/385) to fix the bug.

This update fixes a bug when override-source-dir and USE_DEST_DATE_FOLDER were both enabled, then the override would be ignored.

What Else Changed

  • Update docs by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/385
  • Fix ignored override-source-dir when USE_DEST_DATE_FOLDER=true by @mrjk in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/384
  • Add test for: Fix ignored override-source-dir when USE_DEST_DATE_FOLDER=true by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/386

New Contributors

  • @mrjk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/384

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.9.0...v2.9.1

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.9.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/387

  • Update dependency pydantic to v2.10.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/389
